Introduction

SWAY was a three-member South Korean co-ed group under A2Z Entertainment consisting of JayYeon, Saya and Joonhyuk.

They debuted on October 29, 2020 with the digital single "Episode 1". The members prepared for debut for two years.

They are presumed to have silently disbanded around 2023 due to a lack of social media activity.
